survey_spec.name: Network Operator Commands
survey_spec.description: Restricted list of commands executable by operator

spec.question_name: Select a command you would like to execute
spec.question_description: Select a command you would like to execute

survey_spec.name: System Survey
survey_spec.description: Prompt for system propertires such as hostname

spec.question_description: this will set the username on the network device
this is not required if using an SSH key

spec.question_name: Please paste the SSH public key here
spec.question_description: this is not required, please leave blank to use plain-text password

spec.question_name: Please enter a privilege level (for network OS that support it)
spec.question_description: This argument accepts integer values in the range of 1 to 15
non-Juniper devices will ignore this field
